title: 614. Development of Young Quarterbacks with Dan Orlovsky
itunes:title: 614. Development of Young Quarterbacks with Dan Orlovsky
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys give stories from their scouting days (:31). After, the duo discuss the importance of watching practice film, since there are limits of watching college players at practice as a result of the pandemic (9:37). Then, ESPN's football analyst Dan Orlovsky joins to talk about what a head coach needs to do to be successful, the development of young quarterbacks like Joe Burrow and Justin Herbert, and more (20:59).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
